thread.title: Will Cheryl and Liam Payne name their baby boy one of these bookies' favourites?
thread.title_full: Will Cheryl and Liam Payne name their baby boy one of these bookies' favourites?

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Will Cheryl and Liam Payne name their baby boy one of these bookies' favourites?
text:
Will Cheryl and Liam Payne name their baby boy one of these bookies' favourites? The singer said her baby boy still doesn't have a name Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Cheryl and Liam Payne welcome a healthy baby boy Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Cheryl and Liam Payne welcomed their first child this week. 
But announcing the birth last night, Cheryl revealed their son still doesn't have a name. 
And now the bookies have slashed odds on favourite Alfie at 4/1. 
The prediction came from Cheryl in an interview two years ago when she revealed her favourite name for a boy. What will they name their baby? 
Speaking to GQ she said: "Of course I’ve thought about baby names a million times. I like Alfie for a little boy." 
She added: "I love kids, I’m obsessed with babies. 
"I know that’s what I was put on the Earth to do – to be a mother." 
William Hill are also offering good odds on Simon at 14/1 – after X Factor boss Simon Cowell – but that seems unlikely after he dumped Cheryl from the show. Cheryl and Liam announced the birth with this picture (Photo: cherylofficial/Instagram) 
Other unusual suggestions include Harry at 10/1, Zayn at 20/1, Niall at 25/1, and Louis at 25/1 – after Liam's One Direction bandmates. 
Other top names include Rickie, Henry, James, Rory, David, Grayson, Jacob, Logan, Maddison, Richard, Robert, Jaxon, Levi, Riley and Rupert. 
But least likely seems Ashley at 25/1 – the name of Cheryl's ex-husband Ashley Cole. 
The happy couple became parents on Wednesday. 
Sharing news of the birth, Cheryl posted a picture of Liam holding his son, and wrote: "On Wednesday 22nd March Liam and I became parents to an incredibly beautiful, healthy baby boy, weighing 7lb 9 and looking like a dream. Although he still doesn't have a name he is already stealing hearts. Read More
